idea-plugin.name: JEM
idea-plugin.description: This plugin scans JVM libraries to understand what exceptions the method might throw. You need to select the lines with the method calls you want to check and press ctrl + alt + e, then you will see a window with possible exceptions and method calls, that raise it. In addition, the plugin will show you what exceptions can be thrown inside a try block, other than those caught in catch blocks. Currently, analysis is possible for Java and Kotlin languages.
